channel.title: Posts on Hakai Institute Open Data Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hakai Institute Open Data Lab

item.title: How to post a blog!
item.author: data@hakai.org (Hakai Insititute)
item.description: Welcome to a new platform to share blog posts, how-to guides, example data anlayses etc. I encourage people to publicize some of their hard work so that you and others may benefit! Step by step instructions: Open R-Studio and create new project by checkin out project from version control set URL to https://github.com/HakaiInstitute/open-data-mgmt Open project Go to files, click on Blog folder, click Blog.Rproj to open a ‘sub-project’ within the open-data-mgmt project.

item.title: Welcome Gallery
item.author: data@hakai.org (Hakai Insititute)
item.description: Welcome, friends, to a data blog by the Hakai Institute. Explore environmental data with scientists as they seek to uncover the secrets of our complex coastal ecosystems. Below are some examples of data visualizations you can work on in our GitHub Repository I really hope you like what you find, and you consider making your work public so that you and others can benefit from collaboration.

item.title: The unreasonable effectiveness of public work
item.author: data@hakai.org (Hakai Insititute)
item.description: In honour of the honourable David Robinson. Thanks for the inspiration. See David's oriniginal presentation here
